title: Soothing Sichuan Stay on Heilong Lake
description: Boasting soothing lake views, InterContinental Heilong Lake, an IHG Hotel is a serene stay in the heart of Sichuan. Delight in authentic local delicacies at the traditional Long Xuan restaurant or unwind in The Lodge which brings the outdoors inside, then cool off with a plunge into the outdoor pool. Find a moment of tranquility as you indulge in a soothing tea at the Cha Lounge tea room or gaze out onto verdant landscapes and crystal clear waters to the glittering Heilong Lake.
location_description: InterContinental Heilong Lake, an IHG hotel
offer_address: No1 Xi Hu Avenue, Si Hai Community Heilongtan Town, Renshou County, Meishan, SC, 620561, China
